snippet: While prenatal exposure to mercury, found in fish, is linked to A.D.H.D. symptoms, the greater a mother's consumption of fish, the less likely her child is to have the symptoms, a study has found.
abstract: While prenatal exposure to mercury, found in fish, is linked to A.D.H.D. symptoms, the greater a mother's consumption of fish, the less likely her child is to have the symptoms, a study has found.

headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Patterns: Prenatal Mercury Exposure and A.D.H.D.
